ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, browsing thru my mails and realise this, Your 1 group of 3 Melees, 1 Shaman, 1 Wizzy and 1 Cleric doesnt include your Mage? /bonk Damuo again, yay......
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, browsing thru my mails and realise this,

Your 1 group of 3 Melees, 1 Shaman, 1 Wizzy and 1 Cleric doesnt include your
Mage?

/bonk Damuo again, yay......

This is to revenge for not including enchie in ur group, hehe

Alex Tan aka Tiffa Dancinsword
Divine Grace
Erollisi Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: <kctan@...>
To: <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 27, 2001 11:55 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.


>
>
> I would bring 3 Melees, 1 Shaman, 1 Wizzy and 1 Cleric. Might want to
bring an
> enchanter for C2.
>
> You will see PA casting when she's up at zone in.
>
> Lvl 60 puller invis up, go to centre of spire and drop down, Once u see PA
> casting, swim up and ask ur mage to CoTH. Then run back to see whether PA
is
> alone out of her lair. If so, just pull her back. But I prefer to use just
the
> eye to pull to zone in. Much easier and faster. Any danger just zone out.
>
>
> Damuo, a monk without a god.
> Divine Grace
> Erollisi Marr
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> "K. W. Lee" <kw.lee@...> on 27/04/2001 10:34:47 AM
>
> Please respond to sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com
>
>
>
> To: "'sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com'"
> <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
>
> cc: (bcc: Terence Tan/IHL-HQ/SIN/IHL)
>
>
>
> Subject RE: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
> :
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> What is balance grp? Like what Alvin said, PA and its kakis got high MR,
> and I think SS cannot be stunned or merz. How many HP PA got? If 1
> balance grp of 55+ can drop it, then isn't it quite easy to farm? hehe.
>
> Btw, sure can hear PA casting xxxx at zone in? If yes then I just park
> druid there to monitor k liao, thx ;)
>
> Btw, I thot Mage COH will clear aggro? If clear aggro liao, how to pull
PA
> out?
>
> On 27 April, 2001 10:19 AM, kctan@...
> [SMTP:kctan@...] wrote:
> >
> >
> > 1. One balance lvl 55+ grp can kill her.
> >
> > 2. Not sure whether it's bannable but we use it all the time.
> >
> > 3. same as number 1 but best is puller be lvl 60. Mage CoTH make it
> easier to
> > get her solo.
> >
> > 4. not really, just watch ur water breathing.
> >
> > 5. no need track, just zone in and if she's up. u can see the msg she's
> casting
> > blah blah blah.
> >
> > Damuo, a monk without a god.
> > Divine Grace
> > Erollisi Marr
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > "K. W. Lee" <kw.lee@...> on 27/04/2001 09:24:37 AM
> >
> > Please respond to sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com
> >
> >
> >
> > To: "'* Singapore EQ Mailing List'"
> > <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
> >
> > cc: (bcc: Terence Tan/IHL-HQ/SIN/IHL)
> >
> >
> >
> > Subject [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
> > :
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Just to make some noise here: Need tips to kill PA in Kedge Keep with 1
> > team:
> >
> > 1. What is the best combo of this team, average lvl?
> > 2. Is the eye pulling method a bannable offence (ie use eye spell to
pull
> > PA to zone in).
> > 3. Alternatively is to invis all the way to ledge, how siong is it to
> kill
> > the 4 SS, guardians and PA?
> > 4. Anything to watch out when fighting PA and its kakis?
> > 5. I thinking of parking a druid at KK zone in, with max 125 tracking
> > skill, I wonder if he can track PA from zone in or have to swim deeper
to
> > track? Is it true that all mobs in KK cannot see invis except guardians
> > and PA? Is there any safe room near PA where I can invis a druid and
> park
> > there to check if PA is up? If k, then it's better to track 1st then
> call
> > grp than the other way round.
> >
> > Thx.
> >
> >
> > Zil.
